comments:
Scenario (build M6):

1) Create Hello, World plug-in
2) Create com.example.xyz-feature project and add the plug-in into it
3) Create Update Site project and add the feature into it
4) Build the feature.
5) Increment plug-in version from 1.0.0 to 1.0.1
6) Increment feature version from 1.0.0 to 1.0.1 and also the plug-in 
reference inside feature.xml to 1.0.1 
7) Try to build again - NPE:
